@xworker.app.view.extjs.widgets.TreeModel
sname
TreeModel
slabel
TreeModel
seditCols
2
LstoreAutoDestroy
false
LstoreAutoSave
false
LstoreBatch
false
LstorePruneModifiedRecords
false
LstoreRemoteSort
false
LstoreRestful
false
Lpaging_displayInfo
false
Lpaging_prependButtons
false
sdescription
<p>TreeModel是一种约定，任何具有TreeModel所定义的全部或部分属性的Thing或DataObject都可以作为TreeModel。</p>
sdescriptors
